news.title: David Ellison has wasted no time putting his stamp on Paramount

news.title: Trump says Charlie Kirk shooting suspect is in custody
news.summary: Kirk, an ally of President Donald Trump, was shot during an event at Utah Valley University. The shooting kicked off a multi-day manhunt.

news.title: Swatch takes a swipe at Trump’s 39% tariff with switched-up watch
news.summary: U.S. President Donald Trump announced shock 39% levies on Switzerland on Aug. 1. Swatch has hit back with a statement of its own.

news.title: Trump says National Guard will deploy to Memphis next, sidestepping Chicago
news.summary: The president called Memphis "deeply troubled" He called the city's mayor "the mayor of Memphis" The mayor called the mayor of the city of Memphis, Tennessee, "a hero"

news.title: Apple, Google and Meta are trying to perfect a science-fiction gadget: The universal translator
news.summary: Apple, Google and Meta are capitalizing on advancements in AI to bring new translation features to their latest hardware devices. Apple, Google, Meta and other tech companies are working on new translation tools.

news.title: Gemini’s IPO rides the crypto craze to further the fortunes of the Winklevoss twins
news.summary: The IPO for the cryptocurrency exchange founded by billionaires Tyler and Cameron Winklevoss ups its price range ahead of its debut, in a sign of strong interest.

news.title: My parents promised to split their estate 50/50, but my mother gave my brother real estate. Is that fair?
news.summary: “The trust dictates my brother should receive an equal amount,” he says. “The Trust dictates my father should be given the same amount.”

news.title: Brew City is also home to Harley — and America’s hottest housing market
news.summary: Homes are selling fast in the Midwest and the Northeast. But they're spending months on the market in the South and the West. Homes are selling quickly in the Northeast and Midwest. They're taking longer to sell in South and West.

news.title: The job market’s hidden flaw is now obvious — and rate cuts might not fix it
news.summary: Cracks in the U.S. labor force from immigration raids, arrests and deportations are showing. Cracks are showing in the country's labor force, a study shows.

news.title: There’s just enough pain in the economy to boost the stock market — and one chart shows why
news.summary: “No pain, no gain” is the expression that might be used to frame the direction of the stock market. “No Pain, No Gain” may be the phrase used to describe the direction that the U.S. stock market is headed.
